Indestructible
[i]Scythe of Sariel[/i] – Whenever Jeritza deals damage to a creature, that creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is his power.
[i]Murderous Intent [/i]– Whenever a creature dies, if they had 0 or less toughness, their controller loses 3 life.
[i]Relentless Approach[/i] – You may cast Jeritza from your graveyard or from exile.
